resources.string: This sample demonstrate flatMap usage. How to get IPs from hosts. \n The task of getting IPs was executed in work thread. Consuming final result in main thread.
This sample demonstrate usage of map operator. Including the operator of flatMap use case and demonstrating how to transform data by map operator
This sample demonstrate what difference between flatmap and concatmap.
Retrieve data from Multiple Observables. For example, getting data from memory,disk,network. which layer data not null, will stop check the other layer
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
